title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.2 - Smoking or carrying naked flame restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1272.2 - Smoking or carrying naked flame restricted

State Regulations

No person shall smoke or carry lighted cigars, cigarettes, pipes, matches or any naked flame in or upon any fuel storage area, public landing area, public ramp or apron area, public passenger ramp and apron
area, public cargo ramp and apron area or public aircraft parking and storage
area, on any open deck, gallery or balcony contiguous to and overlooking any
such area, in any other place where smoking is specifically prohibited by
signs, or upon any open space within 50 feet of any fuel carrier which is not
in motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1272.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
